import { Card, Button, ListGroup, Badge } from "react-bootstrap"; export const MonthlyStatsCard = ({ stats }) => { const time = stats.time; const hour = Math.floor(time / 3600); const minute = Math.floor((time - hour * 3600) / 60); const second = (time - hour * 3600) % 60; return ( <> Febrero
Distance
{stats.distance} m
Time
{`${hour}h ${minute}' ${second}"`}
Elevation Gain
{stats.elevation_gain} m ) }
